nodes.text: Ampli was an individual. At one occasion, Ampli was invited to a Vector Day gala organized at the Boulderdash by the Quenk jazz artist Mrp-Mrp Poo. According to Dyslogia Twang, Ampli was a "blaggart".

Ampli was mentioned in a two-page segment titled "Sightings by Twang", written by Bob Carrau for the 1993 book Monsters and Aliens from George Lucas, a publication that collects concept designs and photographs from various George Lucas projects. Lucasfilm employee Leland Chee, who maintains the Holocron continuity database, has indicated that information contained in the book is non-canonical.
